result.name: Login Link
result.tooltip: Link to send to user with deferral token

parameters.parameter: <%= { "Space Name" => @inputs['Space Name'], "Space Slug" => @inputs['Space Slug'], "Launch Type" => @inputs['Launch Type'], "AWS Task Definition - Task" => @inputs['AWS Task Definition - Task'], "AWS Task Definition - Response" => @inputs['AWS Task Definition - Response'], "Requester Email" => @inputs['Requester Email'], "Requester Name" => @inputs['Requester Name'], "Dedicated Task Engine" => @inputs['Dedicated Task Engine'], "Property File Uri" => @inputs['Property File Uri'], "Deferral Token" => @results['Defer']['deferral_token'], "Default Locale" => @inputs['Default Locale'], "Default Timezone" => @inputs['Default Timezone'], "Has Reporting Database" => "True" }.to_json %>

parameter.label: Login Link
parameter.tooltip: Link to send to user with deferral token

parameters.parameter: <%= ['kinops-gold','manage','shared','shared-nagios','kinetic-calendar','kinetic-schedule'].include?(@inputs['Space Slug'])? raise("#{@inputs['Space Slug']} is a reserved space slug that can not use this process") : "" %>

parameter.label: Wait time:
parameter.tooltip: Time you want to wait for deferred task

parameter.label: Time unit:
parameter.tooltip: Unit of measurement for time (Seconds, Minutes, Hours, Days, Weeks)

parameter.label: Recipient List
parameter.tooltip: Comma separated list of recipients (Usernames, SMTP Addresses, and/or Team Names)

parameter.label: Notification Template Name
parameter.tooltip: Name of the notification template to use when sending this email

parameters.parameter: Kinops Environment Creation Did Not Complete

parameter.label: JSON Vars
parameter.tooltip: JSON input of miscellaneous values. These values are used to replace placeholder content in notification messages.

parameters.parameter: <% tasks = @results.has_key?('Call AWS Shim - EC2') ? @results['Run ECS Job - EC2']['Tasks'] : @results.has_key?('Call AWS Shim - FARGATE') ? @results['Run ECS Job - FARGATE']['Tasks'] : [] %> <%= { "Notification Delay" => @results['Notification Delay in Minutes']['output'], "Space Name" => @inputs['Space Name'], "Space Slug" => @inputs['Space Slug'], "Requester Email" => @inputs['Requester Email'], "Requester Name" => @inputs['Requester Name'], "Deferral Token" => @results['Defer']['deferral_token'], "Run Id" => @run['Id'], "AWS Info" => tasks.to_s }.to_json %>

parameter.label: System
parameter.tooltip: System to search for ID. Defaults to Request

parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: Space Slug of the submission to get values for. Used to retrieve Request submissions, notification templates, users.

parameter.label: ID
parameter.tooltip: Id of the submission to get values for, required if using those or attachments in the message

parameter.label: Admin Kapp Slug
parameter.tooltip: Slug of this spaces admin kapp (typically admin)

parameter.label: Kapp Slug Initiating Notification
parameter.tooltip: The slug of the Kapp sending the notification (ex: catalog, queue, etc.)

parameter.label: Error Handling
parameter.tooltip: Determine what to return if an error is encountered.

parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: The Space the submission is being retrieved from.

parameter.label: Error Handling
parameter.tooltip: Determine what to return if an error is encountered.

parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: The Space the submission is being created in (defaults to info value if not provided).

parameter.label: Datastore Form Slug
parameter.tooltip: The slug of the datastore form the submission is for.

parameter.label: Values
parameter.tooltip: JSON map of submission field values.

parameters.parameter: <%= { "Space Slug" => @inputs['Space Slug'], "Company Name" => @inputs['Space Name'], "Admin Name" => @inputs['Requester Name'], "Admin Email" => @inputs['Requester Email'], "Environment Status" => "Build In Progress", "Exclude from Repair All" => "False" }.to_json %>

parameter.label: Current Page Name
parameter.tooltip: Set the current page name.

parameter.label: Current Page Navigation
parameter.tooltip: Set the current page navigation.

parameter.label: Error Handling
parameter.tooltip: Determine what to return if an error is encountered.

parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: The Space the submission is being updated in (defaults to info value if not provided).

parameter.label: Datastore Submission Id
parameter.tooltip: The id of the submission being updated.

parameter.label: State
parameter.tooltip: The value used to set the submission state.

parameter.label: Values
parameter.tooltip: A JSON map of field names to values that should be set.

parameters.parameter:
<%= shared_workflow = false JSON.parse(@results['Retrieve Space']['Attributes']).each { |attribute| if attribute['name'] == 'Shared Workflow Engine' shared_workflow = attribute['values'].inject(false) { |result, value| result || ['yes', 'true'].include?(value.to_s.strip.downcase) } break end }
{ "Space Slug" => @inputs['Space Slug'], "Company Name" => @inputs['Space Name'], "Admin Name" => @inputs['Requester Name'], "Admin Email" => @inputs['Requester Email'], "Environment Status" => "Active", "Shared Workflow Engine" => shared_workflow ? 'True' : 'False', "Status" => "active" }.to_json %>

parameter.label: Current Page Name
parameter.tooltip: Set the current page name.

parameter.label: Current Page Navigation
parameter.tooltip: Set the current page navigation.

parameter.label: AWS Region
parameter.tooltip: Name of the AWS Region (ex: us-west-2)

parameter.tooltip: S3 Bucket for AWS Credentials
